page.title: 08Blandford - Playground Game
page.content: In the playground we play Eggs,Bacon, Chips & Cheese. There is a person'ON IT'and that person asks the other people to put out their hands & she taps their hands & says{'Eggs,Bacon, {Chips & Cheese which would you rather {please for your supper tonight'.}The person whose hand she taps on'tonight' chooses eggs or bacon & so on. If she chooses chips she gets swung fast, bacon is slower,eggs slower still & cheese is the slowest.After you've been swung you stay in the shape you land.When everyone has had a swing the person ON IT tells each one what they look like-gorilla,ballerina,gymnast, sunbather.Then she says{Clockworks {begin}& they have to act what they look like.Then she says{Clockworks go {to sleep}& everyone lies down & she wakes up all but one. Everyone shakes that person.That person is On It.CARLY
